name: Work In Progress (Lost In Code)
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

Commands :

        Up / Down / Left / Right / Space    or    I / J / K / L / Space

Just me, an hobbyist dev, trying to tame the Defold game engine through a little shooter experiment. Very early development stage. There's not even a game still. I'm putting this online to help keeping motivation up. Defold is doing extremely well so far, and i can't wait to master it.
